alert.note: Alert for Clinch; Echols; Southern Ware (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 31 at 9:12PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT SOUTHEASTERN ECHOLS...WEST CENTRAL WARE AND EASTERN CLINCH COUNTIES THROUGH 1000 PM EDT... At 912 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking thunderstorms along a line extending from near Cogdell to near Needmore. Boundary collisions may enhance these storms. These storms were nearly stationary. HAZARD...Wind gusts around 30 - 40 mph and minor flooding due to heavy rainfall. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor flooding due to heavy rainfall is possible. Locations impacted include... Fargo, Argyle, Cogdell, Needmore, and Manor. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
